author: Raymond Green

review: The Fire TV Stick is a great choice. It is easy to install and works great. With all the apps available there are a lot of entertainment available. If you are considering this type of product, I would recommend it.
author: Mary Byrd

review: Love the fire stick, easy setup and really convienent.
author: Erika Jent

review: It is ok, Just want more updated apps.
author: Oscar

review: These products get better and better. I wish that the simple registration of Netflix & Amazon Prime were even simpler and that connectors for other than HDMI inputs and outputs were in the box. Also that fuller illustrated connection possibilities were documented in the hard-copy insert.

review: Very easy to operate. No need to use a blue ray or play station anymore. Very convenient.
